article_title: Video: A larger ‘Stonehenge’ may have just been discovered
article_text:
Giant ancient ruins discovered near Stonehenge

(0:56)

Archaeologists have discovered what they say are the buried remains of a prehistoric stone monument just 2 miles from Stonehenge.
